summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the municipal light and power system and authorizing execution of an agreement between South Columbia Basin Irrigation District and the City of Seattle together with the City of Tacoma to provide for the transmission of power and energy generated at South Columbia Basin Irrigation District's generating plants at milepost 66.0 on Potholes East Canal (PEC 66.0) and a milepost 4.6 on the Eltopia Branch Canal (EBC 4.6) to points of interconnection in Bonneville's Glade and Ringold Substations.
